lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball is studying whether to raise the bottom of the strike zone from the hollow beneath the kneecap back to the top of the kneecap.

headline.main: M.L.B. Considering Raising Bottom of Strike Zone

snippet: Major League Baseball is studying whether to raise the bottom of the strike zone from the hollow beneath the kneecap back to the top of the kneecap.
abstract: Major League Baseball owners consider proposal to move bottom of strike zone back to top of kneecap, where it was until 1995; other baseball news noted.
